description: Manage month-end and year-end accounting close processes, prepare financial statements, and ensure compliance with accounting standards. Support senior management with financial analysis and reporting.
responsibilities: Prepare and review monthly financial statements; manage accounts payable and receivable; perform reconciliations of general ledger accounts; assist with budget preparation and variance analysis; coordinate with external auditors during audits; ensure compliance with GAAP/IFRS; manage fixed assets register; prepare tax schedules and support filings.
